For sale

PP/FF or personal check - I'll cover shipping.

T207 Alex McCarthy - very difficult player to find.  Anonymous back is the scarcest of the three.  SOLD for $195

T207 Otto Miller SGC 3 - sharp card.  $225

T207 Vean Gregg  SGC 2.5 - looks nicer.  $200

T207 Tom Downey  SGC 2 - also a tougher player with an Anon back.  $275 SOLD
